cues: lengthen your spine upward to create space for breath

cues: lengthen your spine upward to create space for breath

cues: press your feet firmly into the mat to feel grounded
engage your legs to support your posture

name: Tree Pose

embedding_text: Tree Pose Vrksasana: balance pose targeting legs, core. Intensity 3 with focused energy.

name: Eagle Pose
cues: fix your gaze forward to support balance
engage your core to stabilize your body

cues: fix your gaze forward to support balance

embedding_text: Half Moon Pose Ardha Chandrasana: balance pose targeting legs, core. Intensity 3 with focused energy.

name: Boat Pose
cues: engage your core muscles to support your spine

embedding_text: Boat Pose Navasana: core pose targeting core. Intensity 4 with fiery energy.

name: Forearm Plank
cues: engage your core muscles to support your spine
draw your navel in toward your spine for stability
lift your chest while keeping your core active
embedding_text: Forearm Plank Makara Adho Mukha Svanasana: core pose targeting core. Intensity 4 with fiery energy.

name: Cobra Pose
cues: lift your chest forward and up to open the front body
engage your glutes gently to support your lower back
lengthen your spine before bending to avoid compression
embedding_text: Cobra Pose Bhujangasana: backbend pose targeting spine, chest. Intensity 3 with energizing energy.

name: Locust Pose
cues: lift your chest forward and up to open the front body
engage your glutes gently to support your lower back
lengthen your spine before bending to avoid compression

cues: lift your chest forward and up to open the front body
engage your glutes gently to support your lower back
lengthen your spine before bending to avoid compression
embedding_text: Camel Pose Ustrasana: backbend pose targeting spine, chest. Intensity 3 with energizing energy.

name: Bridge Pose
cues: lift your chest forward and up to open the front body
engage your glutes gently to support your lower back
lengthen your spine before bending to avoid compression
embedding_text: Bridge Pose Setu Bandhasana: backbend pose targeting spine, chest. Intensity 3 with energizing energy.

name: Pigeon Pose
cues: relax your hips downward to encourage release
keep your hips level to protect your joints

embedding_text: Pigeon Pose Eka Pada Rajakapotasana: hip-opener pose targeting hips. Intensity 3 with releasing energy.

name: Goddess Pose
cues: relax your hips downward to encourage release
keep your hips level to protect your joints
soften your jaw and face to reduce holding
embedding_text: Goddess Pose Utkata Konasana: hip-opener pose targeting hips. Intensity 3 with releasing energy.

name: Seated Forward Fold
cues: relax your hips downward to encourage release
keep your hips level to protect your joints
soften your jaw and face to reduce holding
embedding_text: Seated Forward Fold Paschimottanasana: hip-opener pose targeting hips. Intensity 3 with releasing energy.

name: Seated Twist
cues: lengthen your spine upward before rotating
rotate your torso from the ribcage rather than the shoulders
keep your hips steady to focus the twist
embedding_text: Seated Twist Ardha Matsyendrasana: twist pose targeting spine. Intensity 2 with cleansing energy.

name: Revolved Lunge
cues: lengthen your spine upward before rotating
rotate your torso from the ribcage rather than the shoulders
keep your hips steady to focus the twist
embedding_text: Revolved Lunge Parivrtta Anjaneyasana: twist pose targeting spine. Intensity 2 with cleansing energy.

name: Shoulder Stand
cues: engage your core to support your spine
stack your shoulders over your elbows or wrists for stability
lengthen your neck by lifting away from the shoulders

name: Headstand
cues: engage your core to support your spine
stack your shoulders over your elbows or wrists for stability
lengthen your neck by lifting away from the shoulders
embedding_text: Headstand Sirsasana: inversion pose targeting core, neck. Intensity 4 with steady energy.

name: Crow Pose

name: Side Crow
cues: press your hands firmly into the mat to activate your arms

name: Firefly Pose

name: Wheel Pose
cues: focus your breath to stay present in the pose
